snippet: The Chinese telecommunications equipment maker, seemingly trying to avoid entanglement in a government crackdown on corruption, promised to be lenient with employees who admitted violations.
abstract: The Chinese telecommunications equipment maker, seemingly trying to avoid entanglement in a government crackdown on corruption, promised to be lenient with employees who admitted violations.

byline.original: By PAUL MOZUR and SHANSHAN WANG

headline.main: Thousands at Huawei Came Forward in Push Against Fraud, Founder Says
